Health & Wellness

Bug extracts in Starbucks drinks?

Starbucks is under fire this week for revealing that its Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino and strawberry-flavored smoothies contain cochineal extract -- a red dye made out of dried, crushed, female cochineal beetles.
